text:
[Verse]
Twinkle up high
Light in the night
Brighten the sky
Shining so right

[Verse 2]
In the black sea
So far above
Guide us with glee
Share your love

[Chorus]
Oh stars in the sky
Sparkle so bright
Stay through the night
In your light I fly

[Verse 3]
Winks from afar
Tiny beacons
Forget where we are
Moments that deepen

[Bridge]
Make a wish now
Hope in their gleam
Find a way how
Follow your dream

[Chorus]
Oh stars in the sky
Sparkle so bright
Stay through the night
In your light I fly
title: Stars in the Sky
